column5: How amazing it will be come July if George Gillet the owner of the Montreal Canadiens and Ray Evernham join forces in Nascar.  This would be amazing!  Two of my favorite sports building a solid relationship.  A car flying the bleu, blanc a rough with the habs sybol on the hood. (I can dream). Lets hope it all comes together!  Easton. (The Autism Speaks 400 delayed until Monday.)
That would be cool,maybe a Molson sponsorship also.Guess I'll be coming home early tomorrow. Joe
Now all as you need is a French Driver, put pot holes in the track  and you can win. Peace Ken
Forecast is for more rain today. Jacque Villeneuve is looking for a Nascar ride. This could be the French Canadian driver you are looking for.
